name: Lithia Motors, Inc.
description: Lithia Motors, Inc. is one of the largest automotive retailers in the United States, specializing in the sale of new and used vehicles. Founded in 1946 and headquartered in Medford, Oregon, Lithia operates over 200 dealerships across the country, offering a wide range of automotive brands including Toyota, Honda, Ford, Chevrolet, and many others. The company is committed to providing exceptional customer service and a seamless car-buying experience, leveraging its proprietary technology and data analytics to enhance efficiency and customer satisfaction. Lithia Motors is also focused on expanding its digital retailing capabilities, allowing customers to complete their purchases online or through the company's user-friendly mobile app. In addition to vehicle sales, Lithia provides vehicle financing, service, and parts, ensuring a comprehensive automotive experience for its customers. The company is dedicated to community involvement and sustainability, actively supporting local initiatives and reducing its environmental impact through various green practices. With a vision to be the most trusted and innovative automotive retailer in the industry, Lithia continues to grow its footprint and enhance its offerings to meet the evolving needs of consumers.

seo.meta_title: Lithia Motors, Inc. | Leading Automotive Retailer
seo.meta_description: Lithia Motors, Inc. is a premier automotive retailer with a focus on customer satisfaction, offering a wide range of new and used vehicles along with comprehensive services.

faq.question: What does Lithia Motors do?
faq.answer: Lithia Motors is an automotive retailer specializing in the sale of new and used vehicles and providing vehicle services.

faq.question: Where is Lithia Motors headquartered?
faq.answer: Lithia Motors is headquartered in Medford, Oregon, USA.

faq.question: What services does Lithia Motors offer?
faq.answer: Lithia Motors offers vehicle financing, maintenance, repairs, and a wide range of new and used vehicles.
